vote.question: On Passage of the Bill
vote.title: H.R. 2, As Amended; A bill to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 3074
vote.title: Lee Amdt. No. 3074; To prohibit certain practices relating to certain commodity promotion programs and require greater transparency by those programs.

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 3383
vote.title: Motion to Table Kennedy Amdt. No. 3383; To provide for certain work requirements for able-bodied adults without dependents and to require State agencies to operate a work activation program for eligible participants in the supplemental nutrition assistance program.

vote.question: On Cloture on the Motion to Proceed
vote.title: Motion to Invoke Cloture on the Motion to Proceed to H.R. 2; A bill to provide for the reform and continuation of agricultural and other programs of the Department of Agriculture through fiscal year 2023, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On Passage of the Bill

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 3021
vote.title: Motion to Table Lee Amdt. No. 3021 As Modified; To terminate a rule relating to the definition of "waters of the United States".

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2983
vote.title: Bennet Amdt. No. 2983; To increase employment for members of the Armed Forces in emerging industries.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2971
vote.title: Tester Amdt. No. 2971; To prevent the denial of access to records and documents by various inspectors general.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2926

vote.title: Motion to Discharge H.R. 3; A bill to rescind certain budget authority proposed to be rescinded in special messages transmitted to the Congress by the President on May 8, 2018, in accordance with title X of the Congressional Budget and Impoundment Control Act 1974.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2985
vote.title: Baldwin Amdt. No. 2985; To set aside funds for cooperative agreements and laboratory support to accelerate the domestic production of Molybdenum-99.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2943
vote.title: Crapo Amdt. No. 2943 As Modified; To increase funds for a nuclear demonstration program.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2920
vote.title: Carper Amdt. No. 2920; To direct the Secretary of the Army to submit a report on the status of returning to non-Federal project sponsors excess non-Federal funds.

vote.question: On the Amendment S.Amdt. 2914
vote.title: Gardner Amdt. No. 2914; To express the sense of the Senate regarding the need for funding for innovative scientific research.

vote.question: On Passage of the Bill
vote.title: H.R. 5515 As Amended; To authorize appropriations for fiscal year 2019 for military activities of the Department of Defense, for military construction, and for defense activities of the Department of Energy, to prescribe military personnel strengths for such fiscal year, and for other purposes.

vote.question: On the Cloture Motion S.Amdt. 2282

vote.question: On the Motion to Table S.Amdt. 2366
vote.title: Motion to Table Lee Amdt. No. 2366; To clarify that an authorization to use military force, a declaration of war, or any similar authority does not authorize the detention without charge or trial of a citizen or lawful permanent resident of the United States.

vote.question: On the Motion to Proceed
